short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly mute users, keywords and phrases from your X feed.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your X (formerly Twitter) experience with X Feed Muter. 

This powerful and user-friendly Chrome extension allows you to quickly mute users, keywords, and phrases from your X feed, giving you full control over your social media experience. With our intuitive muting tools, you can curate your feed to focus on the content that matters most to you.

Features:

- Comprehensive Muting: Easily mute users, keywords, and entire phrases with just a few clicks. Whether you want to avoid spoilers, filter out specific topics, or take a break from certain accounts, our extension has you covered.

- Quick Actions: Our extension adds convenient mute buttons next to usernames and trending topics, allowing for instant muting without interrupting your browsing flow.
Customizable Filters: Create and manage multiple filter lists for different purposes. Easily switch between work-friendly, entertainment-focused, or news-oriented filters with a single click.

- Temporary Muting: Set expiration dates for your mutes. Perfect for avoiding spoilers for a limited time or taking a short break from specific topics.

- Regular Updates: We're committed to improving your X experience. Our team regularly updates the extension to ensure compatibility with X's latest features and to introduce new muting capabilities.

- User-Friendly Interface: Managing your mutes settings is a breeze with our intuitive dashboard. No more digging through the maze of your settings.

- Seamless Integration: Once installed, our muting features blend seamlessly with X's interface, providing a native feel to your customized experience.

- Privacy-Focused: All muting preferences are stored within X. We don't store or interact with any of your data.

Take control of your X feed and enjoy a more tailored social media experience. With X Feed Muter, you can focus on the content that truly interests you, making your time on X more productive and enjoyable.

Install now and start curating your perfect X feed today!
